name: Tiny Tanks (itch) (JBrosDev)
description:
TINY TANKS

Play on Unity Here: https://play.unity.com/mg/other/tiny-tanks-2

This game was a collaborative project with my brother who has no game dev experience.

A 2-4 player tank shooting game. The game has nice physics and is just fun all around while being very funny. 

Controls:

Player1: 8, 4, 5,  and 6 on the number pad to move and rotate the turret. Number pad 0 is shoot.

Player2: WASD is move and rotates the turret. Left control is shoot.

Player3: Arrow keys is move and rotate the turret. Right control is shoot.

Player4: I, J, K, and L is move and rotate the turret. Space is shoot.
